Author: BitsOfAByte
Name: GoodFriend
Punchline: Instant friend login & logout notifications in-game between GoodFriend users.
Description:
A client to communicate with any GoodFriend-Compatible API to send & receive notifications when your friends login and logout of the game (as long as they are using this plugin & are connected to the same instance).

Features:
- Privacy-focused in design, all data is completely anonymized before leaving your machine.
- Support for "friend codes" to only receive and send notifications with others who share the same code.
- Customizable login & logout messages
- Basic & Bearer authentication support
- Can show notifications in chat, as a toast, or as a pop-up
- & more.
